mapper.insert: INSERT INTO quality_defects (date, model, defect_type, resolved, defective_quantity, shift, cause, action, factory_id, resolved_date) VALUES (#{date}, #{model}, #{defectType}, #{resolved}, #{defectiveQuantity}, #{shift}, #{cause}, #{action}, #{factoryId}, #{resolvedDate});
mapper.select: SELECT qd.* FROM quality_defects as qd;
SELECT qd.*, f.factory_name FROM quality_defects as qd LEFT JOIN factory as f ON f.factory_id = qd.factory_id WHERE qd.factory_id = #{factoryId} AND qd.date = CURRENT_DATE();
